Title: User Management
Description: Handle registration, login, profile management, and authentication for customers and admins.

Title: Product Catalog
Description: Enable administrators to manage products, categories, inventory, and pricing. Allow users to browse and search items.

Title: Shopping & Checkout
Description: Support adding items to cart, managing the cart, and completing purchases through secure payment processing.

Title: Order Management
Description: Track, view, and manage customer orders from placement to fulfillment.
